overview: It's Christmas and Bikini Bottom as you've never experienced them before! Created entirely in Stop Motion animation, It's the SpongeBob Christmas Special, 'Tis the Season to be Jerky! At Christmastime in Bikini Bottom, everyone's excited except Plankton, who always gets a lump of coal from Santa. But he vows this year he'll finally get his wish â€“ the Krabby Patty formula! And it won't be by being good. He's gonna make everyone in Bikini Bottom bad!
title: It's a SpongeBob Christmas!
